body:
Yeah this wife deserved to get cucked.
Prefect karma for ruining FL chances with the MC when he was younger. Lying, manipulating bitch deserves to get cheated on.

I see some of you here bashing fmc and mc for cheating, but I'd like to remind you that the ponytail girl is the first one who lied to the both of them. Because she wanted mc for herself and she lied to both fmc and mc about each other having someone else in their life while both fmc and mc loved each other. Ponytail girl chased mc behind fmc's back and won him over by lying. Thus when they finally found out about the lie, they were overwhelmed by their underlying feelings of loving each other. The second last page where mc promised fmc that he will never leave fmc and it's a promise he will keep this time, makes me think that mc may divorce ponytail and get together with fmc. I would if I'm in mc's position. Ponytail cheated by not competing fairly with fmc. If she can lie just to make mc her's, what else can she lie about in the future? And I say serve her right for feeling guilty in that last page. She deserves it.

個人非常喜歡這故事

但這裡一堆"先後順序"搞不懂在那邊靠杯的老外w

This kind of pissed me off. No not kind of. It definitely pissed me off.

Oh dear.... The main girl is just fucked up. She didn't even feel ashamed when she meet the wife and the newborn. Well what can I do anyway since this isn't real. But pretty sure this already happen in real life-

Basically, the wife in the hospital lied to the guy when they were kids. She said that the other girl already has a boyfriend so he gave up on her despite promising to her that they will get married someday. Pretty good story. Not really pure NTR since the guy really liked main girl.  Glad it will have a next part someday.

Art is legit but, she ruined there marrige. They were all childhood friends the other girl got the man, she had a good enough chance and blew it. Herr getting drunk to through the WAP at him and confess was fucked up and the worst time, they just had a kid. He probably did not nut in a while and went for it, and then for her to show her face and give there kid a present was a smack in the wifes face to me. Fuck both of them for putting her through that
Cheating bastard must die.
Wait, so the wife felt sorry for the heroine because she "stole" the guy? She realized that the heroine also had a thing for him, is that it? Aww... Now I kinda feel bad for her...
This one seems nice, so I scrolled to see the other works and... yeah, it feels like this is probably the best and only valuable work from this author
I'm so confused on who got cheated on cuz of Chinese subtitles, rip
NTR for retarded fags who can't get laid

actually no. I'm anti-ntr but don't actually feel anything againts it's fans. You're free to like what you like and i'm free to enjoy what i enjoy. If the other vanilla fans annoyed you in anyways, i'm sorry for their behavior. We should all be able to have our own kink and it's wrong to condemn others for theirs ( unless they're a pedophile). Once again, i'm sorry on behalf of all vanilla fans that does stuff like hating on other works just because it enrages them. They, like me, should keep it to themselves and go on with their day.
where are the angry vanillacucks who always cry in NTR ? i bet your inner shy-cuck enjoy this right ?
I feel really conflicted on this one
basically, she says sorry to the heroine in the end.
whats the wife's monologue at the end?
